TopicTitle: [0.17] Kosmos Spacecraft Design Bureau - 0.17 LK parts released

Articles.Content: going to have to wait for the rest of KOSMOS to be released re scaled. currently not much point using the older sized stuff.
why? why?
alone, please edit your post so it makes more sense

I'm just crying, the part that should be straight, was bent

almost...

Edited August 24, 2012 by alone

I am sure KOSMOS needs beta testers. you should PM normak and ask for it

but ai promise that is all fixed in the new version :/ we fixed nodes months ago but never updated them. and that speter part. just go into the .cfg file and make all the attach point last three numbers match.

for the node past in

node_stack_right = 0.3332353745, 0, 0, -1, 0, 0, 1

node_stack_left = -0.3332353745, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 1

node_stack_back = 0, 0, 0.3332353745, 0, 0,-1, 1

node_stack_front = 0, 0,-0.3332353745, 0, 0, 1, 1

node_stack_top = 0, 0.3332353745, 0, 0,-1, 0, 1

node_stack_bottom = 0,-0.3332353745, 0, 0, 1, 0, 1

and this in the spektr 1m to 0.5m taper

node_stack_top = 0, 0.5479029871, 0, 0, 1, 0

node_stack_bottom = 0, -0.5479025995, 0, 0, 1, 0

also, you know each station model has names like Kvant 1 or 2 or Pridora which you can use to attach them properly to make Mir >>

Edited August 25, 2012 by CardBoardBoxProcessor
are you guys making new parts? what are they going to be modeled after?
@alone - Can't you correct that by rotating it a just little (with the shift key)?

I'm having a lot of fun with this mod, thanks.

I do have a few issues now, my strap on boosters are not being triggered to eject when on auto pilot after the fuel runs out.

They will separate if I manually trigger them when the auto pilot is on.

I'm also having problems ending flights.

The last flight I was able to end the capsule's flight, but now the tracking station shows the capsule's separation ring and forward nose section as two separate flyable flights.

I'm the only one having these issues?

going to have to wait for the rest of KOSMOS to be released re scaled. currently not much point using the older sized stuff.

Do you have any idea how long it will take to do that?
im having a problem that when i download it it dosent come with everything that should come with it plz help
This pack is only the VA capsule. The rest of the Kosmos pack hasn't been updated yet.
can't wait till the rest is updated!
Great to have VA working, cant wait for Angara. These are easily my favorite mod pack on KSP.
Are the parts in this the low-res version? My computer hates it when I use high-res.
Funny thing is, using the old one, I nearly docked.
can you make this mod in .zip instead of .rar
is there something I can insert into the .CFG file for the Kvant-2 airlock so it can have a crew capacity and also have kerbals be able to enter it?

add this

// --- internal setup ---

CrewCapacity = 1

u might need to ummm. add the hatches. refer to a modder for help
hatches coming soon to all kosmos sspp stuff

hatches coming soon to all kosmos sspp stuff

Yes!

It's all great stuff, but sooner or later those ungrateful Kerbals want to get out.

The complete Kosmos pack is one of my essential mods. I even looked on the unofficial sites to make sure I wasn't missing any of your packs

May I make a request, though? Tone down the kick from the solar panels while deploying...

Well I guess yall deserve some update lol.

I Re-modeled the RD-191.

It is much shorter profile than the old engine, much higher detail (1000 polies less) and should be a good bit pprettier in game. It will also have emissive effects. The plumping is also much more accurate

yessssssssssss!!

progress!

are the parts just gonna get remolded? or are new parts going to get added to?
Are you sure you need a higher poly version ? The Angara and Kosmos parts make me lag quite a bit already...

Are you sure you need a higher poly version ? The Angara and Kosmos parts make me lag quite a bit already...

you misunderstand. the new one is 1000 polies less than the old one.
